content.question: In the context of the passage as a whole, which of the following best characterizes the function of the first paragraph?

choices.label: It explains what started the author on the career path that she discusses later in the passage.
It introduces a type of cooking that is described in detail throughout the rest of the passage.
It provides information about the author’s siblings that she uses to support claims she makes later in the passage.
It presents details about the author’s childhood that contextualize what follows in the passage.

content.answer: It presents details about the author’s childhood that contextualize what follows in the passage.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
